test_code_analysis: These tests verify the authentication functionality of a login endpoint, including scenarios for successful login, invalid credentials, missing data, and unexpected exceptions.

The tests verify the functionality of the LoginService's user authentication process, covering scenarios including successful authentication, invalid passwords, locked accounts, non-existent users, and missing or null credentials.

The tests verify the login functionality of the account lock controller, covering successful logins, invalid credentials, missing user ID or password, empty request bodies, non-JSON data, and exception handling scenarios.

These tests verify the account lockout controller's behavior during login attempts, including successful logins, invalid data submissions, account lockouts, incorrect passwords, and various missing or empty data scenarios.

These tests verify the authentication functionality of the AuthService class. They cover scenarios including successful authentication, wrong password handling, non-existent user handling, and appropriate logging on failed and successful authentication attempts.
